results.summary: Users find Alterna Caviar Moisture to be a luxurious alternative to Pureology Hydrate, though it is expensive.
representative_quotes: feels even more luxurious, though expensive.

results.summary: Users find the product effective for dry ends.
representative_quotes: tried it again and it’s still great for dry ends.

results.summary: Users find Aveeno Fresh Greens Blend to have a pleasant smell and is refreshing and gentle, particularly suitable for oily roots.
representative_quotes: smells great
Refreshing and gentle, great for oily roots

results.summary: Users find the product smells good and feels gentle, but question its effectiveness in cleaning product buildup.
cons: may not clean product buildup well
representative_quotes: Smells good and feels gentle, but I’m not sure it actually cleans product buildup well.

results.summary: Biolage Colorlast is appreciated for maintaining vibrant hair color and being gentle for frequent use.
representative_quotes: Keeps color vibrant, gentle enough for frequent washes.

results.summary: Users with thin hair find that this shampoo adds volume without stickiness.
representative_quotes: Makes my fine hair look fuller without feeling sticky.

results.summary: Users appreciate the minty smell and cooling effect of Briogeo Scalp Revival, but find it a bit pricey.
representative_quotes: Smells minty and cooling — love the tingling effect. A bit pricey though.

results.summary: Users find the product creamy and moisturizing but note that buildup can occur if not rinsed well.
representative_quotes: Feels creamy and moisturizing, but buildup happens if I don’t rinse really well.

results.summary: User found the product too heavy for fine hair.
cons: May be too rich for fine hair
Can make hair feel heavy and oily
representative_quotes: Used this for a week and my hair feels heavy and oily.

results.summary: Users report that Dove Men+Care Thickening Shampoo makes hair look fuller and has a clean, subtle smell.
representative_quotes: Actually makes hair look fuller. Smell is clean and not overpowering.

results.summary: Users find the shampoo lightweight and appreciate the personalization, but note that it is expensive.
representative_quotes: Feels lightweight and personalized, but it’s kind of expensive.

results.summary: User considering switching from Pantene to Garnier Fructis Sleek & Shine, inquiring about product weight and buildup.
representative_quotes: I’ve used Pantene for years but want to try something new. Is Garnier lighter or still has buildup?

results.summary: Users find the product to have a pleasant scent and texture, and it is nourishing for damaged hair.
representative_quotes: Nice scent and texture, feels very nourishing for damaged hair.

results.summary: Users find the product effective for mild dandruff and appreciate its smell.
representative_quotes: Head & Shoulders Apple Fresh is nice - Smells clean and fruity. Works fine for mild dandruff.

results.summary: Users find it effective for deep cleaning without drying, suitable for gym days.
representative_quotes: Cleans deeply without drying — perfect for gym days.

results.summary: Users find Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength effective against dandruff.
representative_quotes: Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength actually works - Been dealing with dandruff for months. Tried this one and flakes are almost gone after 3 washes.

results.summary: Users find Head & Shoulders Supreme to be an improved version of the regular product, with added moisture.
representative_quotes: Feels fancier than the regular version, adds more moisture too.

results.summary: Users find the product underrated, with a pleasant smell and effective softening properties without heaviness.
representative_quotes: The smell alone is amazing and it left my hair feeling super soft. Not heavy at all.

results.summary: Users report that Herbal Essences White Grapefruit & Mint makes their hair smell good and adds shine.
representative_quotes: Makes my hair smell amazing and adds a little shine.

results.summary: Users find that John Frieda Brilliant Brunette brings out brown tones well but lacks moisture.
representative_quotes: Brings out my brown tones nicely, but not much moisture.
